description.value: Gain +10 to all Tech-Use Skill Tests. The Character can spend a Fate Point to automatically succeed on a Tech-Use Skill Test for enhancement, repair, or upgrade of a machine's systems, taking the minimum amount of time possible for the task. At GM discretion, the character can repair objects without all parts to hand by jury-rigging a working device as good as the original.
